definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Were parasitized larvae overwinter in the frozen soil layer below, known as winter worm.
sentences.chinese: 被寄生的幼蟲在凍土層以下越冬，稱爲冬蟲。

sentences.english: The presence of sea ice and of permafrost helps protect Arctic barrier islands for much of the year.
sentences.chinese: 海冰和凍土層的出現很多年來幫助保護了北極障壁島。

sentences.english: The theoretical basis for reinforcing of dynamic compaction in winter and treating the frozen soil layer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了關於冬季強夯加固處理凍土層的理論依據。

sentences.english: There is 5, 000 miles of railway track built on permafrost.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯有5000英里的鐵路線修築在永久凍土層上。

sentences.english: It is located in the ice-house – a cave hollowed out in the permafrost.
sentences.chinese: 它是一間由在永久凍土層中挖出的洞而成的冰屋。

sentences.english: On the beach there is a jagged layer of thawing permafrost.
sentences.chinese: 海灘上，有一個不規則的正在融化的永久凍土層。
